description: This file defines a custom Polymer web component 'paper-tab' used for tabbed interfaces, including styling, behaviors, and scripting for interaction.

classes.name: paper-tab
classes.description: Custom web component representing a tab with styling and interaction behaviors.

methods.name: ready
methods.description: Initializes ripple properties when component is ready.

methods.name: attached
methods.description: Updates ripple behavior when component is attached to DOM.

methods.name: _updateNoink
methods.description: Updates the 'noink' property based on parent component.

methods.name: _parentNoink
methods.description: Getter that checks if parent component has 'noink' property.
